embeds.title: published npm package: **hello-world-npm** 1.0.0
embeds.description:
# hello-world-npm
This is a simple npm package that demonstrates the \[Github Packages\]\(https://github.com/features/package\).
## Installation 
\`$ npm install\`
## Usage
\`\`\`
const myPackage = require\('hello-world-node-package'\);
myPackage.helloWorld\(\);
…
